name: Easy Peasy Apple Pie Pancakes

ingredients.name: Easy Peasy Bagel, Pancake & Waffle Mix
melted butter or oil for frying

preparation: In a bowl, whisk together mix and spice. In a separate bowl, gently beat eggs. Add eggs, milk and oil to large bowl; stir just until mixed.
Heat a large non-stick fry pan or griddle over medium heat; lightly brush with melted butter or oil.
Working in batches, pour batter, scant 1⁄4 cup at a time, into pan (don’t crowd pan or it will be too tricky to flip them!).

Cook until bubbles appear on top, about 3 min. Flip and cook until bottoms are golden brown, about 1–2 more min. Transfer to a Sheet Pan lined with two Cooling Racks; keep warm in preheated 250° F oven until ready to serve.
tips: Use melted coconut oil for easy frying and great flavour.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup berries or unsweetened applesauce and 1⁄2 cup 2% plain Greek yogurt.

products.name: Easy Peasy Bagel, Pancake & Waffle Mix
